answers.answer: Actually  with both my boys I needed to be induced and they were really big one of the issues is having a big baby but no muscle tone . be prorated for a big baby and they liked it inside didn't want to come out lol

question: So I am 37 weeks  tomorrow and my little man is measuing not so little at 7lbs 12oz  as of Monday already. I was diagnosed several weeks ago with gestational diabetes and there is a high likelihood that I will need to be induced due to risk factors. FTM here and want to know what other GD moms have experienced and when you were induced or did your little one come early to avoid induction?
title: GD and inducing
